item.title: Ukraine's spies target Russian figures in increasingly brazen attacks
item.description: Attacks on Russian figures have become more brazen as Ukrainian special services penetrate security in Moscow.

item.title: General killed in Moscow a legitimate target, says Ukraine
item.description: Ukrainian sources tell the BBC the country's security service was behind the killings.

item.title: Anti-whaling activist Paul Watson released from jail in Greenland
item.description: Danish authorities reject a Japanese bid to extradite the campaigner because of his time spent in detention.

item.title: Los Zetas cartel boss re-arrested in Mexico after US jail time
item.description: Osiel Cárdenas Guillén founded the feared group of brutal cartel hitmen known as Los Zetas.

item.title: EU investigates TikTok over alleged Russian meddling in Romanian vote
item.description: Romania's election was cancelled after thousands of TikTok accounts were activated backing a little-known candidate.
